div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 239 Larissa, Thessaly, 1948 Burial: c. 175-165 B.C. (T) Contents: 52 AR Alexander III: 1 dr. ( Lampsacus) Thessalian League: 1 double-vict. Magnetes: 1 dr. Thebes: 3 triob. Thespiae:1 triob. Boeotian League: 3 dr. Boeotia unc.: 1 triob. Locri Opuntii: 3 triob. Phocis: 1 triob. Chalcis: 8 dr. Histiaea: 28 tetrob. Aegina: 1 triob. Disposition: M. Wallace, Toronto Photos on file in ANS
